ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.filter
Interface RequestFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRequestFilter, ConcealDocumentPrepareFilter, ConcealDocumentReceiveFilter, DocumentDetailsChangedPrepareFilter, DocumentDetailsChangedReceiveFilter, FailureFilter, InvitationRejectedRecipientFilter, InvitationRejectedSenderFilter, InviteRequestRecipientFilter, InviteRequestSenderFilter, JoinRejectedRecipientFilter, JoinRejectedSenderFilter, JoinRequestRecipientFilter, JoinRequestSenderFilter, LogFilter, NullRequestFilter, PublishDocumentPrepareFilter, PublishDocumentReceiveFilter, SendDocumentsPrepareFilter, SendDocumentsReceiveFilter, ShutdownFilter, UserDiscardedRecipientFilter
public interface RequestFilter

RequestFilter defines the interface for each request filter implementation.
